['DescriptionExclusive with Espace Real Estate is this upgrade and extended villa located in District 6. The villa is single row and sitting on a huge plot with upgraded garden and beautiful landscape. This popular layout in Jumeirah Park comprising of 3 bedrooms family room. The ground floor consists of open kitchen with spacious living and dining areas, guest powder room. There are 2 car garages at the front of the property accessible to the maids and utility room. The 1st floor consists of a large family room, 3 bedrooms with individual en-suite bathrooms. The master en-suite boasts a huge bathroom, walk in closet dressing area and balcony.
